# includingAll

**Type Property**

A filter that includes all point of interest categories.

## Declaration

```swift
class var includingAll: MKPointOfInterestFilter { get }
```

## Discussion

You can use [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKPointOfInterestFilter/includingAll]  to include all points of interest in your map view without listing all the categories individually.

## Creating filters

- **excludingAll**: A filter that excludes all point of interest categories.
- **init(excluding:)**: Initialize the point of interest filter with a list of categories to exclude.
- **init(including:)**: Initialize the point of interest filter with a list of categories to include.
